name: Holodeck
uniques: Only available <if [Colosseum] is constructed in all [non-[Puppeted]] cities>

civilopediaText.text: While extremely entertaining and stimulating, the Holodeck's energy consumption is at a premium. Still, this is the only major component the Aliens bothered to retreive from their crashed spaceship and jury-rig to some functionality.

name: Breeders
uniques: [33]% Food is carried over after population increases [in this city]

civilopediaText.text: While the Aliens do sport a vigorous libido, their minds are too perverted to conentrate on procreation. To avoid extinction, they've come up with these tanks, which essentially contain a living embryo-producing bioconstruct engineered from their own genome.
